alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 08 at 2:34PM PST until March 10 at 6:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ TO 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and south central and southern Nevada. * WHEN...From 8 AM PST /9 AM MST/ to 6 PM PST /7 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; Death Valley National Park; Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Morongo Basin
